name: Antpire
description:
𝐆𝐚𝐦𝐞 𝐈𝐧𝐟𝐨

Antpire is a game where you control a queen ant and have to collect food to grow, get upgrades using the food to further expand your colony, the more food you get the more ants, the faster gathering, and the speed you upgrade. See how many upgrades you can get in this ant filled game

𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐥𝐬

- WASD = Move

- Right Click  on food = Harvest food

- Left Click on food = Call Ants

𝐂𝐫𝐞𝐝𝐢𝐭𝐬

Coding & Unity Project Setup : TudyPie

Art : Oily Boi

Music : Lightspeed6

This game was made for Brackeys game jam 2021.1. Sorry for any bugs! Please leave a comment with  some feedback or suggestions!
